mpicxx   -Wall -O2 -DEIGEN_FFTW_DEFAULT -march=core2 -msse2 -msse3 -mssse3 -mno-sse4.1 -mno-sse4.2 -mno-sse4a -mno-avx -O2 -g   CMakeFiles/hs-mpi.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hs-mpi.dir/mpi_master.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hs-mpi.dir/mpi_slave.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hs-mpi.dir/mpi_job.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hs-mpi.dir/mpi_iface.cpp.o  -o hs-mpi -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lboost_mpi-mt -lboost_serialization-mt -lboost_program_options-mt -lboost_regex-mt -lboost_system-mt -lboost_filesystem-mt -Wl,-Bdynamic -lmpi ../spinlib/libhslib.a -Wl,-Bstatic -lboost_mpi-mt -lboost_serialization-mt -lboost_program_options-mt -lboost_regex-mt -lboost_system-mt -lboost_filesystem-mt -Wl,-Bdynamic
